text: Burry Port Rugby Football Club is a rugby union team from the village of Burry Port in West Wales. The club is a member of the Welsh Rugby Union and is a feeder club for the Llanelli Scarlets. ==Club honours== * WRU Division Five West 2007/08 - Champions 2015/16 SSE Swalec bowl Champions ==Notable former players== * Howard Davies (6 caps) (rugby player) Rob Owens (rugby player) Arwyn 'rhino' Phillips ( 1 cap warriors) ==References== Category:Welsh rugby union teams Category:Burry Port
title: Burry Port RFC
